name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Focus Mojo. It's your time, be productive.

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple focus timer extension for you to work smarter.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Focus Mojo is a simple timer app to let you focus on one thing at a time. Whether you're designing the next great app, or cooking pasta pomodoro and not wanting to burn your marinara on the stove, we've got you covered!
